alert.note: Alert for Eastern Pendleton (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 14 at 8:22PM EST until January 15 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 1 PM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations 1 to 3 inches through midday Monday. * WHERE...In Virginia, Highland County. In West Virginia, Eastern Pendleton County. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 1 PM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The combination of cold temperatures and accumulating snow will cause hazardous conditions for the Monday morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Additional snow is likely Monday afternoon through Tuesday morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. When venturing outside, watch your first few steps taken on steps, sidewalks, and driveways, which could be icy and slippery, increasing your risk of a fall and injury.
